p: Introduction: Intensive Care Unitâ€“acquired weakness (ICU-AW) is a frequent complication of critically ill patients with an approximately incidence of 25%-50%. The diagnosis is clinical and consists in assessing the strength of various muscles groups in the upper and lower extremities. This problem represents one of the greatest burdens patients face after surviving ICU care. Objectives: To assess the incidence and identify clinical factors associated with ICU-AW in an Oncology Center.
